}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm]] QCN9024 ''Pine'' series • PCIe Wi-Fi 6 Radio Module *M.2 E Key interface with PCIe 3.0, JTAG/UART connector *2.4GHz max 24dBm output power (per chain), up to 1148Mbps *4x spatial streams (4SS) Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO) :Frequency Range: 2.412~2.472 GHz
===Purchase Sample=== *[https://www.shop.compex.com.sg/product-page/pn01-1 Compex System Sample Store]
